courses.name: 서호공원
courses.advice_short_en: Okay to run with some caution ⚠️
courses.advice_detail_ko: 꽤 춥습니다. 긴팔+긴바지에 방풍 자켓을 더해 주는 것이 좋습니다. 약한 바람으로 러닝에 큰 지장은 없습니다. 노면이 건조해서 미끄럼 위험이 적습니다. 공기질이 좋아 러닝에 거의 지장이 없습니다. 컨디션에 따라 강도를 조절하고, 평소보다 몸 상태를 더 자주 점검해 주세요.
courses.advice_detail_en: It is quite cold. Long sleeves, tights, and a windproof jacket are recommended. Light breeze with little impact on running. Surface is dry with low risk of slipping. Air quality is good with little impact on running. Adjust intensity based on how you feel and check your condition more often than usual.

courses.name: 청소년문화센터
courses.advice_short_en: Okay to run with some caution ⚠️

courses.advice_detail_en: It is quite cold. Long sleeves, tights, and a windproof jacket are recommended. Moderate wind. It may feel a bit cooler than the actual temperature. Surface is dry with low risk of slipping. Air quality is good with little impact on running. Adjust intensity based on how you feel and check your condition more often than usual.
